article.title: Computerized Drug Information services
article.author: Smith, Daniel R.Beauchamp, R. O. Jr.Garber, Josephine L.Daugherty, Marvel A.
article.text: To compare computerized services in chemistry, pharmacology, toxicology, and clinical medicine of pharmaceutical interest, equivalent profiles were run on magnetic tape files of CA-Condensates, CBAC, Excerpta Medica, MEDLARS and Ringdoc.. The results of these searches, which covered individual chemical compounds used in pharmacology and medicine, are tabulated overlap of services, relative speed of citing references, and unique areas of journal coverage..
